alert.note: Alert for Garrard; Jessamine (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 7:01PM EST until January 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky at Camp Nelson Lock affecting Garrard and Jessamine Counties. .Heavy rain from this past weekend will cause the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky at Camp Nelson Lock. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 29.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 30.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued by Tuesday afternoon.
